head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GREENE, LOWTHER, SUSAN M.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GREENE, LOWTHER, SUSAN M.

block.p: GREENE-LOWTHER-Susan M. On September 30,2000. Beloved wife of Richard. Loving daughter of James and Brigitte Greene. Dear sister of the late Thomas M. Greene. Reposing at Simonson Funeral Home, Inc., 119-04 Hillside Avenue (corner of Lefferts Boulevard), Richmond Hill, NY. Mass of Christian burial Friday 9:30AM at Church of The Holy Child Jesus. Cremation to follow at Fresh Pond Crematory, Middle Village, NY. In lieu of flowers, donations to the National Cystic Fibrosis Foundation would be appreciated; PO Box 96305, Washington, DC 20090-6305
